backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing memories with CRUD operations, optional photos, and author-based access checks.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file mapping features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling auth state and switching between Landing and MemoriesLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding and authentication controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/Landing.tsx: Public landing page with hero, features, and signâ€‘in prompts.
frontend/src/components/memories/Memorie: Layout that manages memory list, new/edit dialogs, and detail view modal.
Displays all memories with search and year filtering, handling loading, errors, and rendering a grid of MemoryCard components.
frontend/src/components/memories/MemoryC: Renders a single memory preview with title, date, optional photo, and view/edit buttons when the user is the author.
frontend/src/components/memories/MemoryD: Shows full memory details with photo, metadata, and actions for editing or deleting when the user is the author.
frontend/src/components/memories/MemoryF: Form for creating or editing a memory with title, content, and photo upload including validation and preview.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemories.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting memories via the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a full set of OKLCH-based CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base global styles.
frontend/src/lib/photo.ts: Provides image validation, file-to-bytes conversion, and a helper to create object URLs from byte arrays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors derived from CSS variables, extensions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and asset guidelines for the family memories app.
